Package g62588.dev3.oxono.model

Class Game

java.lang.Object
g62588.dev3.oxono.model.Game
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observable
public class Game extends Object implements Observable
Facade of the model. We use this class to make communication between the controller and the model

  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      public Game(int size, boolean bot)
      Init the game and the object that we need to use the model
      Parameters:
      size - size of the game board
      bot - boolean to know if we play with bot or not

  • Method Details

    • startGame

      public void startGame()
      Launch the game with an event

    • play

      public boolean play(Position pos)
      The controller use this method to send a position that will be verified to know which use its has. When we know, we call the right method to play. There is also the bot method if we play with.
      Parameters:
      pos - position of the movement
      Returns:
      boolean : Used to know if the pos was correct

    • undo

      public void undo(boolean bot)
      Undo method, it will come back in the previous game play
      Parameters:
      bot - boolean to know if there is a bot player

    • redo

      public void redo(boolean bot)
      Redo method, it will come back in the next game play
      Parameters:
      bot - boolean to know if there is a bot player

    • surrender

      public void surrender()
      Method to surrender the game, it will send an event to the view
